00044 ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor::ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor() :
00045   marlin::Processor("ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor") {
00046 
00047   _description = "2010/08/24 - Jara: Processor extracting saturation curves from ahc-Pm/Cm-Led - runs";
00048 
00049   registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00050                              "Name of the input collection",
00051                              _inColName,
00052                              string("CALDAQ_ADCCol"));
00053 
00054   registerProcessorParameter("ConditionsCollectionName",
00055                              "Collection of AhcConditions objects",
00056                              _condColName,
00057                              string("AhcConditions"));
00058 
00059   registerProcessorParameter("RootOutputFileName",
00060                              "ROOT file to collect TGraphErrors",
00061                              _outFileName,
00062                              string("defaultGraphs.root"));
00063 
00064   registerProcessorParameter("DatOutputFileName",
00065                              "flatfile containing fit results",
00066                              _datFileName,
00067                              string("saturation_fit_output.dat"));
00068 
00069   registerProcessorParameter("TypeOfLedScan",
00070                              "Type of LED mode: 1375 is PmMode-run / 472 is PmMode-run",
00071                              _ledType,
00072                              1375);
00073 
00074   registerProcessorParameter("SubtractPedestal",
00075                              "(false)-without pedestal subtraction, (true)-subtract pedestal",
00076                              _subtractPedestal,
00077                              true);
00078 
00079   registerProcessorParameter("DoFit",
00080                              "(false)-without fit, (true)-do fit",
00081                              _doFit,
00082                              true);
00083 
00084   registerProcessorParameter("NumberPointsUsed",
00085                              "The number of the points used for the fit (counting from the back)",
00086                              _nPointsUsed,
00087                              10);
00088 
00089   registerProcessorParameter("MappingProcessorName",
00090                              "Name of the MappingProcessor",
00091                              _mappingProcessorName,
00092                              string("AhcMappingProcessor"));
00093   
00094 }

00101 void ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor::init() {
00102   printParameters();
00103    
00104   std::stringstream message;
00105   message << "undefined conditionsdata: ";
00106   bool error = false;
00107 
00108   /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00109   _ahcMapper = dynamic_cast<const AhcMapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00110 
00111   if ( ! _ahcMapper ) {
00112     message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName
00113             << ") did not return a valid mapper." << endl;
00114     error = true;
00115   }
00116   
00117   if (error) {
00118     streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00119     throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00120   }
00121   /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00122   
00123   _ahcMaxNumberOfModules  = _ahcMapper->getMaxModule();
00124   _ahcMaxNumberOfChips    = _ahcMapper->getMaxChip();
00125   _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels = _ahcMapper->getMaxChannel();
00126   _ahcMaxNumberOfCells    = _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels * _ahcMaxNumberOfChips;
00127   _mapperVersion = _ahcMapper->getVersion();
00128 
00129   std::cout <<"Init: Max number of Modules="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfModules
00130        <<" Chips="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChips
00131        <<" Channels="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChannels
00132        <<" Cells="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfCells
00133        <<std::endl;
00134   std::cout <<"Mapper version is "<<_mapperVersion
00135        <<std::endl;
00136 }

00144 void ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor::updateMapper() {
00145   _ahcMaxNumberOfModules  = _ahcMapper->getMaxModule();
00146   _ahcMaxNumberOfChips    = _ahcMapper->getMaxChip();
00147   _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels = _ahcMapper->getMaxChannel();
00148   _ahcMaxNumberOfCells    = _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels * _ahcMaxNumberOfChips;
00149   _mapperVersion          = _ahcMapper->getVersion();
00150 
00151 }

00153 /******************************************************************/
00154 /*                                                                */
00155 /*                                                                */
00156 /*                                                                */
00157 /******************************************************************/
00158 void ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00159   if (_mapperVersion != _ahcMapper->getVersion()) {
00160     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" Mapper version changed..."<<std::endl;
00161     this->updateMapper();
00162 
00163     std::cout <<"updateMapper: Max number of Modules="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfModules
00164          <<" Chips="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChips
00165          <<" Channels="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChannels
00166          <<" Cells="<<_ahcMaxNumberOfCells
00167          <<std::endl;
00168     std::cout <<"Mapper version is "<<_mapperVersion
00169          <<std::endl;
00170   }
00171 
00172   int eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00173 
00174 
00176 
00177   LCCollection *condCol = 0;
00178   LCCollection *inCol = 0;
00179 
00180   try {
00181     condCol = evt->getCollection(_condColName.c_str());
00182   }
00183   catch (DataNotAvailableException err) {
00184     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<< _condColName<<" not found in event "
00185                  <<eventNumber<<"-- skipping event\n"<<std::endl;
00186     return;
00187   }
00188 
00189   try{
00190     inCol = evt->getCollection(_inColName.c_str());
00191   }
00192   catch (DataNotAvailableException err) {
00193     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<< _inColName<<" not found in event "
00194                  <<eventNumber<<"-- skipping event\n"<<std::endl;
00195     return;
00196   }
00197 
00198   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n Collection "<<_condColName<<" has "<<condCol->getNumberOfElements()
00199                <<" elements"<<std::endl;
00200 
00201 
00203 
00204   for (int i = 0; i < condCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00205     AhcConditions *cond = dynamic_cast<AhcConditions*>(condCol->getElementAt(i));
00206     if (cond == NULL) {
00207       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Collection "<<_condColName
00208                    <<" does not contain AhcConditions objects -- skiping event"<<std::endl;
00209       return;
00210     }
00211     
00212     bool isValid = false;
00213     unsigned int mod = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromModuleID(cond->getModuleID(), isValid);
00214     if (!isValid) continue;
00215 
00216     condpoint newpoint;
00217     newpoint.vcalib = cond->getVcalib();
00218     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"Vcalib: "<<cond->getVcalib()
00219                  <<" module: "<<mod
00220                  <<std::endl;
00221 
00222     if ( (eventNumber%1000) == 0) {
00223         std::cout <<"Event="<<eventNumber
00224            <<" Vcalib: "<<cond->getVcalib()
00225            <<" module: "<<mod
00226            <<std::endl;
00227     }
00228       
00229     for (int j = 0; j < 12; j++) {
00230       newpoint.shiftreg[j] = cond->getSR(j);
00231     }
00232     _cond[mod] = newpoint;
00233       
00234   }
00235 
00236   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n Collection "<<_inColName<<" has "
00237                <<inCol->getNumberOfElements()<<" elements"<<std::endl;
00238 
00239 
00240 
00242 
00243   unsigned short cell = 0;
00244 
00245   for (int i = 0; i < inCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00246     LCObject *obj = inCol->getElementAt(i);
00247     AdcBlock adcBlock(obj);
00248     
00249     short crate   = adcBlock.getCrateID();
00250     short slot    = adcBlock.getSlotID();
00251     short fe      = adcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd();
00252     short channel = adcBlock.getMultiplexPosition();
00253 
00254     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"    crate/slot/fe/channel="<<crate<<"/"<<slot<<"/"<<fe<<"/"<<channel<<std::endl;
00255 
00256     for (unsigned short chip = 0; chip < _ahcMaxNumberOfChips; ++chip) {
00257       bool isValid;
00258       const int daqChannelID = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getDAQID(crate, slot, fe, chip, channel);
00259       const unsigned int module = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromDAQID(daqChannelID, isValid);
00260       if ( ! isValid ) continue;
00261           
00262       cell = chip * 18 + channel;
00263       assert( (module < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules) && (cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells));
00264   
00265       unsigned short moduleID = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getModuleID(module, chip, channel);
00266 
00267       float ampl = (float)adcBlock.getAdcVal(chip);
00268 
00269       unsigned vc = _cond[module].vcalib;
00270       unsigned sr = _cond[module].shiftreg[chip];
00271       unsigned lt = (unsigned)_ledType; 
00272       
00273       if (sr == lt) { /*SR 1375 is PmMode-run / SR 472 is PmMode-run*/
00274         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sumPm  += ampl;
00275         _data[daqChannelID][vc].sum2Pm += (ampl*ampl);
00276         _data[daqChannelID][vc].nPm    += 1;
00277         _data[daqChannelID][vc].modID  = moduleID;
00278         if (ampl > 32766) _data[daqChannelID][vc].noOverAdc += 1; 
00279         
00280       }/*end of if srr == _ledType*/
00281       
00282     }/*end loop over chip*/
00283     
00284   } /*------------------ end loop over AdcBlocks ----------------*/
00285   
00286 }
00287

00289 /******************************************************************/
00290 /*                                                                */
00291 /*                                                                */
00292 /*                                                                */
00293 /******************************************************************/
00294 
00295 void ExtractSaturationCurveProcessor::end() {
00296   TFile fout(_outFileName.c_str(), "recreate");
00297   if (!fout.IsOpen()) {
00298     streamlog_out(ERROR0)<<" Could not open ROOT file "<<_outFileName<<std::endl;
00299     exit (1);
00300   }
00301 
00302   FILE * pFile;
00303   pFile = fopen (_datFileName.c_str(),"w");
00304 
00305   if (pFile == NULL) {
00306     streamlog_out(ERROR)<<"\n\n Cannot open file "<<_datFileName<<"\n"<<std::endl;
00307     exit(1);
00308   }
00309 
00310 
00311   /*loop over all channels*/
00312   for (map<unsigned, map<unsigned, datapoint> >::const_iterator iterOut = _data.begin(); 
00313        iterOut != _data.end(); iterOut++)  {
00314     map<unsigned, datapoint> cmap = (*iterOut).second;
00315     unsigned daqChannelID = (*iterOut).first;
00316     bool first        = true;
00317     double pedPm      = 0.;
00318     double pedPmCount = 0.;
00319     int module_ID     = -999;
00320 
00321     /*collect data for this channel in vectors*/
00322     vector<double> pm_signal_value;
00323     vector<double> pm_signal_error;
00324     vector<double> vcalib_value;
00325     vector<double> vcalib_error;
00326     double vcalib_err = 0.0;
00327     unsigned short VcalibOverAdc = 0;
00328     unsigned short VcalibRMSOverAdc = 0;
00329     unsigned short OverAdc = 0;
00330 
00331     for (map<unsigned,datapoint>::const_iterator iterIn = cmap.begin(); iterIn != cmap.end(); iterIn++) {
00332       datapoint cdat = (*iterIn).second;
00333 
00334       if (cdat.nPm < 100) continue;
00335       
00336       unsigned vc = (*iterIn).first;
00337 
00338       if (first && cdat.nPm > 0) {
00339         if (_subtractPedestal ) pedPm = cdat.sumPm / cdat.nPm;
00340         first = false;
00341         module_ID = cdat.modID;
00342         pedPmCount = cdat.sumPm / cdat.nPm;
00343       }
00344         
00345       double meanPm = -999, RMS2Pm = -999;
00346       
00347       if (cdat.nPm > 0) {
00348         meanPm = cdat.sumPm / cdat.nPm - pedPm;
00349         RMS2Pm = (cdat.sum2Pm/cdat.nPm - (cdat.sumPm/cdat.nPm)*(cdat.sumPm/cdat.nPm)) / cdat.nPm;
00350         if (meanPm > 32766) VcalibOverAdc++;
00351         if ((meanPm + sqrt(RMS2Pm))  > 32766) VcalibRMSOverAdc++;
00352         OverAdc += cdat.noOverAdc;
00353       }
00354 
00355       if (meanPm >= 0.0) {
00356         pm_signal_value.push_back(meanPm);
00357         pm_signal_error.push_back( sqrt(RMS2Pm) );
00358         vcalib_value.push_back(vc);
00359         vcalib_error.push_back(vcalib_err);
00360       }
00361     }
00362     
00363     double parameter_0 = -99999;
00364     double parameter_1 = 0.001;
00365     double parameter_2 = -99999;
00366     double error_0     = -99.999;
00367     double probability = -9.999;
00368 
00369     unsigned int module  = _ahcMapper->getModuleFromDAQID(daqChannelID);
00370     unsigned int chip    = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getChipFromDAQID(daqChannelID);
00371     unsigned int channel = _ahcMapper->getDecoder()->getChannelFromDAQID(daqChannelID); 
00372 
00373     /*create TGraphErrors from vectors*/
00374     char graph_title[40]; 
00375     sprintf(graph_title, "module%i_chip%i_channel%i", module, chip, channel);
00376 
00377     std::cout << "Graph Title: " << graph_title
00378          << "  Vector size=" << vcalib_value.size()
00379          << std::endl;
00380     
00381     TGraphErrors graph_i;
00382 
00383     if(_doFit && vcalib_value.size() > (unsigned int)_nPointsUsed) {
00384       graph_i = TGraphErrors(vcalib_value.size(), &(vcalib_value[0]), 
00385                              &(pm_signal_value[0]), &(vcalib_error[0]), 
00386                              &(pm_signal_error[0]));
00387       
00388       /*fit last points of curve*/
00389       double Rmin = vcalib_value[vcalib_value.size()-_nPointsUsed] - 1;
00390       double Rmax = vcalib_value[vcalib_value.size()-1] + 1;
00391        
00392       if ( Rmax > Rmin ) {
00393         TF1 *fitFunction = new TF1("fitFunction","[0] * ( 1-exp( -(x+[2]) * [1]))",Rmin,Rmax);
00394         
00395         /*guess starting values for fits:*/
00396         double guess_0 = pm_signal_value[(vcalib_value.size() - 1)];
00397         double guess_1 = 2.0 / guess_0;
00398         double guess_2 = -30000;
00399         
00400         /*do fit, repeat it until probability in accepted range or maximum number of iterations reached, now twice as default */
00401         for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00402           fitFunction->SetParameter(0, guess_0);
00403           fitFunction->SetParameter(1, guess_1);
00404           fitFunction->SetParameter(2, guess_2);
00405           
00406           graph_i.Fit("fitFunction", "RMQ");
00407           
00408           parameter_0 = fitFunction->GetParameter(0);
00409           parameter_1 = fitFunction->GetParameter(1);
00410           parameter_2 = fitFunction->GetParameter(2);
00411           error_0 = fitFunction->GetParError(0);
00412           probability = fitFunction->GetProb();
00413           
00414           guess_0 = parameter_0;
00415           guess_1 = parameter_1;
00416           guess_2 = parameter_2;
00417         }
00418       } else {
00419           std::cout << " Problems with Rmin, Rmax or Vcalib values "<<Rmin<<" "<<Rmax<<std::endl;
00420           std::cout << "  Vector size=" << vcalib_value.size()<<std::endl;
00421 
00422         for (unsigned int iv = 0; iv < vcalib_value.size(); iv++) {
00423                 std::cout<<"iv="<<iv<<"  Vcalib="<<vcalib_value[iv]<<std::endl;
00424         }
00425       }
00426     } else {
00427       graph_i = TGraphErrors(vcalib_value.size(), &(vcalib_value[0]), 
00428                              &(pm_signal_value[0]), &(vcalib_error[0]), 
00429                              &(pm_signal_error[0]));
00430     }
00431 
00432 
00433     /*check if any INFinities or NANs occur in results*/
00434     if( std::isnan(parameter_0) != 0 || std::isinf(parameter_0) != 0 || std::isnan(error_0) != 0 || std::isinf(error_0) != 0 ) {
00435       parameter_0 = -99999;
00436       parameter_1 = 0.001;
00437       parameter_2 = -99999;
00438       error_0     = -99.999;
00439       probability = -9.999;
00440     }
00441 
00442     float SignalVcalibMax;
00443     if (vcalib_value.size() > 0) {
00444       SignalVcalibMax = pm_signal_value[(vcalib_value.size() - 1)];
00445     } else {
00446       SignalVcalibMax = 0;
00447       std::cout <<" !!!! Vcalib size vector is 0 -> SignalVcalibMax = 0"<<std::endl;
00448     }
00449 
00450     fprintf (pFile, "%3d %3d %3d %9.1f %7.3f %5.3f %9.1f %7.3f %7.1f %3d %3d %5d %7.1f\n", 
00451              module, chip, channel, 
00452              parameter_0, error_0, probability, parameter_2, 
00453              parameter_1*parameter_0, pedPmCount, VcalibOverAdc, 
00454              VcalibRMSOverAdc, OverAdc, SignalVcalibMax);
00455 
00456     
00457     graph_i.SetName(graph_title);
00458     graph_i.Write();
00459     
00460   }
00461 
00462   fclose (pFile);
00463   fout.Close();
00464   
00465 };
